Hi,

I'm looking for information on running JUnit tests during an automated=

build process. I do 

know that it's possible to include JUnit tasks in An=
t's build.xml, but
I'm looking for a way 

to make JUnit tests mandatory fo=
r every piece of code that's written
and commited to our 

CVS. Is there a =
way to control uploads to CVS regarding JUnit?

Another info I'd like to ha=
ve: is there a way to decide dynamically
which tests Ant has to 

run (like=
 running tests only for changed parts of source code, for
example)? I do kn=
ow that 

it is common to run all the tests all the time, I'd just like to =
get
to know all the 

possibilities Ant offers when it comes to JUnit.




=
